duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for training spa therapists, teaching them skills, and ensuring proper procedures are in place to perform spa treatments.
Maintain knowledge of departmental policies, service procedures, and standards; monitor achievements and quality standards at the spa.
Coordinate therapist schedules, performance, and retail sales; organize the annual training schedule and monitor operating supplies inventory.
Verifying spa facilities' quality and tool conditions, executing spa standards, and ensuring a courteous, professional service.
Inspect treatment areas, maintain clean, organized work areas, and handle guest inquiries and complaints.
Comply with company policies, maintain a positive attitude, and model the company’s culture, vision, mission, and core values.
Develop and update policies and manuals, ensuring brand integrity and clarity are maintained; attend departmental and general staff meetings.
Handle cleaning materials in accordance with safety rules and assist other staff when needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma; Diploma or degree in a related field; Certified massage therapist or esthetician; dual-licensed is a plus
